homotopy_type_theory.application: Each file type inhabits a topological manifold

region.keywords: controller handler endpoint route api rest mapping request response
config setting property environment variable parameter initialization
auth security permission role access token validate guard protect
service repository implementation business logic dao persistence
error exception log monitor debug trace alert diagnostic test
schedule timer cache session temporal cron async delay timeout

pattern.name: hierarchy_navigation
pattern.query: CYPHER 25 MATCH (nav:NavigationMaster {namespace: $namespace})-[:HAS_DOMAIN]->(d)-[:CONTAINS]->(f:File) WHERE f.entity_type = $entityType RETURN f LIMIT 100

pattern.name: semantic_search
pattern.query: CYPHER 25 MATCH (f:File {namespace: $namespace}) WHERE f.embedding IS NOT NULL WITH f, gds.similarity.cosine(f.embedding, $query_vector) as similarity WHERE similarity > 0.85 RETURN f.name, similarity ORDER BY similarity DESC LIMIT 20

pattern.name: impact_analysis
pattern.query: CYPHER 25 MATCH (changed:File {full_path: $file})-[:DEPENDS_ON|IMPORTS*1..3]-(affected:File) RETURN changed.name, count(distinct affected) as impact_radius

pattern.name: duplicate_detection
pattern.query: CYPHER 25 MATCH (f1:File)-[s:SIMILAR_TO]-(f2:File) WHERE s.similarity > 0.95 RETURN f1.name, f2.name, s.similarity ORDER BY s.similarity DESC

PERFORMANCE_METRICS.self_optimization: CYPHER 25 MATCH (nav:NavigationMaster {namespace: $namespace}) WITH nav, datetime() - duration('PT1H') as hour_ago MATCH (nav)-[:EXECUTED_QUERY]->(q:QueryExecution) WHERE q.timestamp > hour_ago WITH nav, avg(q.execution_time_ms) as avg_time SET nav.optimization_needed = avg_time > 200 RETURN {performance: avg_time, status: CASE WHEN avg_time < 100 THEN 'OPTIMAL' ELSE 'NEEDS_TUNING' END}

protocol.step: Run PowerShell discovery for initial indexing

invocation_examples.discovery: Alexandria, discover all files in C:\Project\MyApp
invocation_examples.search: Alexandria, find STATE_MACHINE entities with high complexity
invocation_examples.impact: Alexandria, analyze impact of changing UserService.java
invocation_examples.semantic: Alexandria, find files similar to AuthProvider
